tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V2.1.9 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential. Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.

programme.title: Revel in the Chaos
programme.sub-title: The best freestyle MTB riding ever
programme.desc: Revel in the Chaos follows Brandon Semenuk as he pushes himself beyond our view of possible. Brandon Semenuk brings a revolution in mountain biking. Revel in the Chaos follows the Canadian as he pushes himself beyond what's possible. It’s not an exaggeration to say this movie features the best freestyle riding ever done on a mountain bike.

programme.title: Through My Eyes
programme.desc: Pro mountain biker Aaron Chase captures a four-day trip to Mexico with his own POV camera. When adventure calls, pro mountain biker Aaron Chase always answers. When he gets the chance to go to Mexico to ride volcanoes, pyramids and jungles, there's no holding him back. Aaron captures the entire trip from his own POV camera.

programme.title: Lifting the Lid
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes on the super secret shoot of Danny MacAskill's Imaginate nearly two years in the making. Danny finally reveals the wild ride he's been dreaming up. He invites cameras to the set of Imaginate and explains the inspiration behind the unique concept, sharing just how complex and difficult it was to shoot the film, but well worth the effort.

programme.title: Passion & Genius
programme.desc: Film director Asif Kapadia presents a trio of short films that celebrate extraordinary people. Director Asif Kapadia introduces three short films that encounter revolutionary human subjects. A mix of documentary and narrative drama, these films all couple a focus on remarkable individuals with sharp visual storytelling.

programme.title: The Wild Ones
programme.desc: Experience the madness of creativity with Jane's Addiction frontman Perry Farrell and photographer Mick Rock. All truly great creativity has an element of madness. Jane's Addiction frontman Perry Farrell's and rock and roll photographer Mick Rock's lives embody those moments where loss and pain bring just enough madness to create genre-defining work.

programme.title: The Sensei: Part II
programme.desc: Daniel Woods proves himself. Now he and his sensei, Yuji Hirayama, are off to the untapped peaks of Borneo. After Daniel Woods proves himself to Yuji Hirayama, the pair travel to the island of Borneo to establish new routes on Mount Kinabalu. The harsh conditions 13,000ft above sea level test both student and master, but they are determined to prevail.

programme.title: Human Dart
programme.desc: A skydiver goes high and long to set the world record for the farthest absolute distance flown in a wingsuit. Skydiver Andy Stumpf loves a challenge, so when he has the opportunity to break four world records in one shot, he jumps at the chance. But what he wants above all else is to break the record for the farthest absolute distance flown in a wingsuit.

programme.title: Mojave test pilot
programme.desc: Test pilot Elliot Seguin must decide if he should build and fly an experimental plane as an expectant father. Test pilot Elliot Seguin has always dreamed of building and flying his own experimental aircraft. His Quickie design is on the verge of completion, but when Elliot finds out he's going to be a father, he must decide if the risk is worth the reward.

programme.title: Onbashira
programme.desc: An ancient celebration that brings renewed spiritual protection to Shinto temples is also a way of life. This religious festival has been celebrated for 1,200 years, making it the oldest in Japan. Trees weighing as much as 9,000kg are brought from the mountains of Suwa to Shinto temples in a two-month celebration of unity, but it's not without danger.

programme.title: Turn Off Your Brain and Ride
programme.desc: Take a look at how to find your flow, that focused state all riders strive for. Curits Keene explores that focused state all riders strive for – a feeling that everything's come together and you're riding faster than you've ever done before. Whether you call it 'flow' or 'being in the zone', here's how to find it.

programme.title: The Cool Kid
programme.desc: Nintendo and Sega squared off against each other in the '90s, both attempting to corner the video game market. While the race to claim market share between Sega and Nintendo was a tight one, the Sega system had access to an FM synth, which introduced new sound possibilities. With it, Yuzo Koshiro produced the masterful Streets of Rage soundtrack.

programme.title: Against the Odds
programme.sub-title: The gaming Cinderella story - EXCLUSIVE RELEASE ON AUGUST 7TH 3PM UTC
programme.desc: This is the journey of five Dota players and a coach, who, just two months before, had never played together. In 2018 Team OG were at rock-bottom, hit by painful departures and scrapping in qualifiers for Dota 2's T18. Against the Odds is the fairytale of this broken team's shot at Gaming’s biggest prize.

programme.title: Music's Future
programme.desc: The legendary GZA, founder of Wu-Tang Clan, explores the future of music technology. Host GZA investigates the future of musical instrument technology at mi.mu and the Berklee College of Music, and freestyles with the future of music at Georgia Tech, United States.

programme.title: Escape. Create.
programme.desc: Dan Atherton designs intense BMX trails for himself and his sibling, brother Gee and sister Rachel. Something of a creative genius, mountain biker Dan Atherton designs intense, difficult trails for himself and his brother Gee, and sister Rachel. Watch as they perform amazing tricks on Dan's highly technical courses.

programme.title: Kriss Kyle's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Kriss Kyle performs a number of world-first tricks in an ever-changing environment designed to deceive. Kriss Kyle is widely regarded as one of the most creative BMX riders of his generation, and Kaleidoscope is his most ambitious project to date. See Kriss perform a number of world-first tricks in an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Kriss Kyle's Kaleidoscope
programme.desc: Kriss Kyle performs a number of world-first tricks in an ever-changing environment designed to deceive. Kriss Kyle is widely regarded as one of the most creative BMX riders of his generation, and Kaleidoscope is his most ambitious project to date. See Kriss perform a number of world-first tricks in an ever-changing environment.

programme.title: Wee Day Out
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill tears around rural Scotland, setting out to capture the simple fun of a ride in the country. A relaxing day out in the Scottish countryside means something different for Danny MacAskill than it does for most people. With his signature trial riding style, Danny makes his way over hay bales, through forests and all along the rolling hills.

programme.title: Moto 9
programme.sub-title: The world's best places for riding
programme.desc: Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues. Journey to the world's most incredible riding locations with riders who are worthy of such venues in Moto 9, the latest of the world's most progressive moto video franchise.
